name: Clamoid
description: Clamoid is an 8-bit Retro Game but used different Enemys. Kill all the enemys, and those enemys are called Clamers kill them before they kill you when you kill them all you go to the next stage. There are 3 stages one stage including a boss fight. Collect power ups for every clamer you kill.  Clamoid is later to be Released on Mobile.
